issue.title: [C++][Dataset] arrow_dataset target does not depend on anything
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6523](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6523). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Other subcomponents have targets to allow their libraries or unit tests to be specifically built
